== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Vivid Vervet (15.04) for distribution on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/VividVervet/ReleaseSchedule | April 23rd, 2015]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 1''' pre-release, you can see what we are trying out in preparation for our next (stable) version. We have some interesting things happening, so read on for highlights and information. 

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 1 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 15.04, the Vivid Vervet, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs and laptops]]</nowiki>.
